content.description: Stand-start on crimps just above the lip and feet low. Get a high foot on the shelf to work your way up to the wide dishy pocket and then do several slab moves to topout
content.location: Front-and center at the Home Base boulder - see photo

content.description: Start on crimps to the right of Iron Sun. Go up to the big bucket hold, mantle on top of it and then work your way left to the same topout as Iron Sun. You might have to clean leaves/needles out of the bucket if it hasn't been done in a bit
content.location: About as far right as you can go at Home Base boulder before hitting the heavy moss

content.description: Start at the far left of the Home Base boulder at ground level. Use crimps and a mantle to get a foot in the crack, stand up, and work your way left for the slabby topout. Same second half as Grand Slab, but the further right you go the harder and sketchier it is). There are a few variations on the start using the inclined boulder behind. Good second problem to do in a warm-up routine after Grand Slab.
content.location: Far left of the Home Base boulder.

content.description: Start on far left, traverse to your right pulling in to avoid the rock sticking up in the middle; finish by matching the bucket on the far right over the lip (V1/2) or mantle onto bucket and top out (V3) for a long one.
content.location: Start at the far left of the Home Base boulder

content.description: Stand start straight up positive slab with good feet
content.location: Scramble on top of the flat rock to your left when standing at the bottom of the Home Base Boulder and then start the problem from up there.

content.description: Stand-start just to the left of the "in-the-way rock" on the good hands. Get feet high under the lip to reach the small crimp high left. Get foot just over the lip and do a big one leg squat to stand up on it. Work your way to the positive slab on the right (Going Going) or left (Gone) for the topout.
content.location: Right in the middle of the Home Base boulder with obvious starting holds (see photo)

content.description: Start on crimps just left of Iron Sun start. Either reach (tall beta) or do hand/foot coordination move (short beta) to get left hand on the slopy lip or get heel up on the shelf and then pull up to lip. Get right hand in the dish and then top out straight up. Top out left of the Iron Sun top half.
Tucked in right along the road at the southern edge of the main area. Road soda boulder is directly on the road.
